name: Biostar-Central
description: BioStar is a Python and Django based Q&A software. It is a simple, generic, flexible and extensible Q&A framework.

BIOSTAR_HOSTNAME.description: The domain name of the hosted instance. It is usually [appname].herokuapp.com

DEFAULT_FROM_EMAIL.description: Default Email for mails from Biostar

SECRET_KEY.description: Secret Key: this will be the default password of admin email

THEME_PATH.description: Path to directory containing the theme

BIOSTAR_HOME.description: This is a required variable. Leave it as it is
